resources.string: This application, computes how world is feeling right now
Just click on Authenticate with twitter button and you are all set to go
Hi! How are you feeling today?
You want to see, how rest of the world is feeling today?

Hi! MoodSense application computes mood of the world for you. This app uses twitter data to predict mood of the world. We search for various moods such as love, joy, surprise, anger, envy, sadness, fear and neutral. We have used several smileys to depict mood type for you:-

The app takes your mood as input and computes how many people in the world are feeling the same as you are. It is also possible to visualize world of mood. This displays the percentage of people with different moods. Hope you enjoy this app!!
Note: You need to have Internet connection and Twitter account to use this app.
